This is a guide to running OWAT on a Linux system.

To run GUI:
	Run the 'Linux-GUI.sh' file.

To run from command line:

	Simply open a terminal window, and navigate to the 'bin' folder.

	You can run OWAT by running the 'owat' executable:
		> ./owat

	You can specify arguments here, for example to run the gui:
		> ./owat -m GUI
